mapper.select: select m.f_measure_check_id,m.order_id,m.check_item,m.cdate,m.measure_data,d.emp_name,m.result,m.note from final_measuret_check m left join employee d on m.emp_id = d.emp_id

select m.f_measure_check_id,m.order_id,m.check_item,m.cdate,m.measure_data,d.emp_name,m.result,m.note from final_measuret_check m left join employee d on m.emp_id = d.emp_id where m.order_id like CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%')

select m.f_measure_check_id,m.order_id,m.check_item,m.cdate,m.measure_data,d.emp_name,m.result,m.note from final_measuret_check m left join employee d on m.emp_id = d.emp_id where m.f_measure_check_id like CONCAT('%',#{fMeasureCheckId},'%')
